name: Godseeker Aniri

skills.name: Blade of Blessings
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Heal the ally with the lowest HP by 5% of their MAX HP. Cannot heal this champion.
Level 2: Damage 5%
Level 3: Heal 5%
Level 4: Damage +5%
Level 5: Heal +5%
Level 6: Damage +5%
Level 7: Heal +5%
Damage Multiplier: 3.6 DEF

effects.stat: ATK|HP|DEF|MAX HP|ENEMY_MAX_HP|Turn Meter|NA|... (as needed, where NA is 'not applicable'. This allows schema validation. This value should not be null)
effects.duration: Duration of buff/debuff in turns (if applicable)
effects.notes: Describe scaling, conditions, or special logic. Use multiple objects for multi-component or conditional effects.

skills.notes: Additional notes (conditional effects, scaling, special interactions, etc.)

skills.name: Quest for Meaning (Cooldown: 4 turns)
skills.description:
Attacks all enemies. Heal all allies by 15% of their MAX HP, then decreases the duration of all buffs on all enemies by 1 turn and increases the duration of all buffs on all allies by 1 turn.
Level 2: Heal +5%
Level 3: Heal +5%
Level 4: Heal +5%
Level 5: Heal +5%
Level 6: Cooldown -1
Damage Multiplier: 3 DEF

skills.name: Rise of Glory (Cooldown: 7 turns)
skills.description:
Revives a dead ally with 50% HP, then fills their Turn Meter by 50% and resets the cooldowns of all their skills
Level 2: Cooldown -1
Level 3: Cooldown -1
Level 4: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Guardian Angel (Passive, Cooldown: 7 turns)
skills.description:
[Passive Effect] Increases the amount of healing allies receive by 10%. [Active Effect] If an ally is about to get killed by a fatal hit, preempts that hit and instantly places a [Revive On Death] buff on them for 1 turn before the damage is taken.
Level 2: Cooldown -1
Level 3: Cooldown -1
Level 4: Cooldown -1
